name: Cry Wolf! Button Badges!
description:
We’re young, we’re small, we’re poor, we’re just starting out. Hey! Help us out?

	Buy some of these beautiful badges, lovingly designed by yours truly, made by our good friends at “Lonely Hearts Pin Badge Club”: http://www.lhpbc.co.uk (check them – they’re rad) and posted to you ready for you to pin to your clothes, bags, cats (don’t do that really) or anywhere else you fancy.

	We get free advertising and some more monies to keep us alive, and you get some sweet stuff. Everyone’s a winner baby.
